tool_description: API showing all the details of farmers protest
name: farmer protest
title: farmer protest

api_list.name: Get new From individual news source
api_list.description: Get new about farmers from specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://farmer-protest.p.rapidapi.com/news/ndtv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farmer-protest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://farmer-protest.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farmer-protest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
